sentence.Network_en: A vacillating person finds it hard to make up his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 优柔寡断的人不易下决心.

sentence.Network_en: She is vacillating between hope and fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一会儿充满希望一会儿深怀恐惧,如此反复不已.

sentence.Network_en: Modern character is inconstant, divided, vacillating.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代人的个性是无常的, 分裂的, 摇摆不定的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: vacillate 踌躇vacillating 犹豫的vacillatingly 犹豫地
The country ' s leaders are still vacillating between confrontation and compromise ., 这个国家的领导者们仍然在对抗和妥协之间摇摆不定.
cursory 匆促的，匆忙的vacillating 摇动的，优柔寡断的feckless 无气力的，软弱的，没精神的
cursory 匆促的，匆忙的vacillating 摇动的，优柔寡断的feckless 无气力的，软弱的，没精神的

list.abs: owing to the loss of big cities and the hardships of war , vacillating elements within our ranks will clamour for compromise , and pessimism will grow to a serious extent .我们内部，因大城市的丧失和战争的困难，动摇分子将大倡其妥协论，悲观情绪将严重地增长
vacillation 游移vacillation cycle 游移周期vacillation phenomena 游移现象
when Gemini vacillates , Aquarius can help stabilize their decisions .当双子座犹豫，水瓶座能帮助稳定他们的决心。
vacillation cycle 游移周期vacillation phenomena 游移现象vacuum 真空

entry.tran: 犹豫不定;踌躇;拿不定主意
entry.def: If you vacillate between two alternatives or choices, you keep changing your mind.

example.ex: She vacillates between men twice her age and men younger than she...
example.tran: 她犹豫不决，不知道是该选择年龄比她大一倍的男人还是比她小的男人。

example.ex: We cannot vacillate on the question of the party's leadership.
example.tran: 在党的领导权问题上我们不能动摇。

auth_sentence.content: Why am I vacillating about taking on this race?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why am I vacillating about taking on this race?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why am I vacillating about taking on this race?

auth_sentence.content: He found them vacillating, he left them decided.
auth_sentence.res_content: He found them vacillating, he left them decided.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He found them vacillating, he left them decided.

auth_sentence.content: That notion of being free from vacillating beliefs gets to me as I sit reading this philosopher at an outdoor taverna table.
auth_sentence.res_content: That notion of being free from vacillating beliefs gets to me as I sit reading this philosopher at an outdoor taverna table.
